Welcome to FreeShow! This guide will walk you through creating your first presentation
To get started, simply open FreeShow and click Get Started
In the Projects pane, we will click the New Project button and give it a name of "Sunday Service"
Click on your project and we'll add a new Section
Sections help you keep your project organized
We'll call this section "Worship"
Let's add some worship song lyrics
Each song will be a "Show" within the project
Click on the 'Shows' tab at the bottom and then "New Show"
Type in the name of the song and click search
Select the song from the search results and lyrics will be loaded automatically
You can then select additional option such as the category for this show and how many lines of text per slide
Use templates to change the look of your presentation
We'll add a few more songs
Let's add another section for the sermon
We'll add a new show for the sermon notes which can be pasted in manually
For offering time lets add a new show category of Other
Then add a new empty Show called "Offering Time"
Let's add a new slide to it
Then we can add a background image by going to the Media tab
We could select an image on our computer or use the Online tab to search for one
Simply drag the image to the edit box
Change the fit from Contain to cover
Now we can add a label by going to Items and selecting the Textbox item
We'll type "Offering Time" but that's hard to read
Lets change the text color to black
Then auto-size the text
And resize and position the textbox to our liking
Go back to the Show tab and you can preview your entire project by clicking the arrow keys
